description:
# Challenge: Advanced Quest System

Create a complex quest eligibility system with multiple requirements!

## Quest Requirements

**Bronze Quest:**
- Level >= 5
- Has completed tutorial

**Silver Quest:**
- Level >= 10
- Gold >= 50 OR has rare item
- Previous quest completed

**Gold Quest:**
- Level >= 20
- Health > 80
- Has magic sword AND has shield
- All previous quests done

## Your Mission

Check player against all three quests and display which ones are available.
